review.comment: The techs who arrived were polite, on time, and answered all of our questions. They also provided great service, and the difference in the before and after pictures is amazing! I am impressed by their good service 😍

This is the third year I've used Aura and every year they are professional, on-time and friendly.The work is carried out to a high standard, I would highly recommend using them.
We use Aura every six months and have done for the past couple of years. I would recommend their service. Fairly priced and good work.

The 2 technicians were on time and very professional. They walked me thru what they would do and went to work. The equipment was impressive and the vacuum hooked up directly to the truck, so no mess in the house.
This was our third experience with Aura Air Duct Cleaning and we continue to be wowed by their service, value, professionalism and timeliness.Best service

review.comment:
All the red flags of a SCAM. Homeowners in upscale neighborhoods, keep your wits about you! You’re the prey. I’ll detail the quoting experience to itemize the red flags and blatant lies, but a friend of mine suggested I get a quote from another company and boy did we dodge a bullet. They came to our home to inspect and quote (real purpose was to learn our address to profile our networth). Other providers can give you a quote without needing to see your home, or even know your address, it is priced by duct. Back to Aura… A smooth talking sales person plus 3 workers show up just for the quoting process. Our house is half the size of the house from Home Alone. The sales man laid on thick the praise.. oh how I love the interior design of your home, oh this is exactly the home I wish I had. Complimentary to the point of being unprofessional. The team spent  an hour at least looking around, breaking for lunch before finishing this lengthy inspection process. This is just to obtain a quote!! We do have black mold. But he said this is the worst case I’ve ever seen in my career. Huge guttural reactions to the site of our ducts. Said that the severity of the mold is taken into consideration in the pricing (come to learn, mold severity bares no impact on service rendered or pricing). A small patch of mold receives the same thorough treatment as our black vortices of darkness. Then it turns out our ducts weren’t properly sealed (yielding more justification for even higher pricing). Again a lie, some companies include sealing as part of the cleaning in their quote. Then the quote process involved the salesman and the three workers ALL hanging out in our living room while he spoke to me and my husband. The workers watched on like they knew they’re were watching an artist work, and the silently watched our faces for our reaction. At this point without yet colluding with my spouse, I felt uneasy. Then as we asked reasonable questions, he used the phrase “to be honest with you” a whole lot. I’ve found when people suddenly start using this as a crutch phrase, they do this to overcompensate they know they’re not being honest with you. One more case study of this in my experience as later we would unearth his lies. Another lie… he said we (Aura) don’t use harsh chemicals… all natural. Later I’d learn that in order to kill living organisms all companies have to use chemicals. As we learned from COVID what soaps actually are antibacterial. They quoted us a five digit number for duct cleaning!!!! 5 digits! For a days work!! The hourly rate for their work rivaling top lawyers! He called the office to inquire more about how they price out their quotes, what factors etc… he couldn’t get a coherent answer from them and sending they were losing us knocked off several grand off the quote! I guess that’s the cynic’s discount. So we didn’t engage, went with another company.
Oh last fib from the salesman, which is HA-larious. He talked about how he could smell the mold when he walked in our home, it just hit his senses so hard. He said he’s a father too and cares about his kids health and air quality. First thing I said to my husband after they finally walked off our property was… “Hon, did you notice he reeked of tobacco smoke?”

He was extremely polite. On time. He went above and beyond by pulling my wash machine and cleaning behind it. He also went on the roof just to show where the vent for they dryer came out. Very professional and educated. Higly recomended.
review.review_reply: Thank you Levi for left your feedback.
